fullText:
Githzerai Beast Mastery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Githzerai, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit: Your beast companion gains a +2 bonus to saving throws against the dazed, dominated, and stunned conditions. When you use your second wind, your beast companion can shift 3 squares as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378.
name: Githzerai Beast Mastery
